body:
Hello, I'm John a new Junior Moderator for Avicus and I would be happy to hear more from the players of the community. One way I thought would be interesting and fun would be through the explanation of the story behind the creation or adaptation of your Minecraft skin! I would love to read how you came up to getting your skin and to get to know you better as-well. :)

**PLEASE LEAVE APPROPRIATE OR COMMUNITY FRIENDLY RESPONSES

replies.body:
One day i wrote a poem, it was a long poem about a village being destroyed by a dragon and a hero going to kill the beast
that hero's name was Brone the Brave.

when i needed a minecraft username i guess that name was still living in me, and for the skin, i just made a skin that looked like him, simple.

replies.body:
I was considering giving a full bio of my skin, but I decided against it.

So basically I like mages, so I got this skin, just a lighter blue version. However a manager at Fyreuk had the same skin as me b/c of Mianite, so I just changed to this sexy dark blue. :P

Thats the benefit of having 4 different backup skins.

replies.body:
The story behind my skin is very simple.

I liked Sunset Shimmer, I picked Sunset Shimmer. :P

I liked her due to her character (Bronies will understand if they watched the 2nd movie). Though sudden, I welcomed it warmly, and it just grew on me.
